line_1: Till ripen'd into manhood still surviv'd,
line_2: Had but his tender budding genius thriv'd,

line_1: Cammilla, the only Daughter still surviv'd,
line_2: And in the midst of this Destruction liv'd;

line_1: See how they have safely surviv'd
line_2: Such Mary's true love that has liv'd
To end our days ere that arriv'd;
